Dear Schooley:
You will recall in connection with the meeting of the
Advisory Committee of the NAEB to the President of the Center, it
was suggested that we attempt to carry over such unexpended funds
as were available for radio programming in our budget this present
year to the next fiscal year with the hope that we might utilize
these funds along with some made available in next year's budget
for the production of one or more rather comprehensive and im¬
portant radio program series. The Board took action at its last
meeting upon my recommendation to carry over these funds and,
consequently, we will have available a sum of money for the
purpose indicated above.
I presume you will want to refer this matter to your
Radio Network Committee, the Program Planning Subcommittee
chaired by Kenneth Wright at WOT, for consideration. Whether
you propose to follow this procedure or not, I am writing to
suggest that we are ready to discuss with you or such persons
as you designate the possibility of doing something in the way
of a more comprehensive program series or two depending upon
the cost during this next fiscal year. I should be glad to
have your suggestion as to the method we should follow in pro¬
ceeding with this matter at your convenience.
Sincerely yours,
H. K. Newl
President
